title: CSS for Developers
description: More often than should be the case, web developers find themselves with the responsibility of implementing the visual design of a website or web application. However, they typically lack the experience to be effective. This session is a crash course in CSSâ€”from fundamental concepts to best practices, and even some insider tips straight from a designer. While we won't talk about aesthetics or how to create design concepts, we will discuss what you need to implement, debug and maintain a visual design.
